original_text: But you have a few people among you in Sardis who have not done these bad things. They are like people who have kept their clothes clean. They will walk with me and they will wear white clothes. They are good people and it is right for them to wear these white clothes.
korean_text: 그러나 사데에 그 옷을 더럽히지 아니한 자 몇 명이 네게 있어 흰 옷을 입고 나와 함께 다니리니 그들은 합당한 자인 연고라

sentences.original_text: But you have a few people among you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희 중에 몇 사람이 있으니

sentences.original_text: in Sardis who have not done these bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 사르디스에 있는데 이런 나쁜 일을 하지 않은 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: They are like people who have kept their clothes clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 옷을 깨끗하게 지킨 사람들과 같다

sentences.original_text: and they will wear white clothes
and it is right for them to wear these white clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이 흰 옷을 입는 것이 마땅하다
